item.title: ELEC ENG 3088 - Computer Architecture
item.description: This is my notes for the course ELEC ENG 3088 - Computer Architecture.

item.title: Linux Project
item.description: In this post, I will put some C++, linux, computer networking and computer architecture concepts and theories. In addition, I will also do a Linux high-concurrency web server project in the end to consolidate these knowledge.
